WorkItem.Description:
Using Build-29269 the values for cloak Armor and Bonus Armor are coming up correctly when loaded from WoWHead, but not when loaded from the Armory. I am guessing this is a limitation on the information available from the Armory.
Â 
Is it possible to get an option to update the item database either as a whole or for a specific slot  from WoWHead instead? Just as an alternative to updating them all manually.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Cloaks getting incorrect Armor values when loaded from Armory

Comments.Message: Correct, the Armory doesn't provide the correct armor values, so it guesses. Yes, I'll be adding a mass update from Wowhead feature.
